content: त्विष् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (त्वेषति-ते) To shine, glitter, sparkle, blaze.

त्विष् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Light, lustre, splendour, brilliance; चयस्त्विषामित्यवधारितं पुरा <ls>Śi. 1. 3</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">9. 13</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 75</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Beauty. {@--3@} Authority, weight. {@--4@} Wish, desire. {@--5@} Custom, practice. {@--6@} Violence, vehemence. {@--7@} Speech.
